channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

item.title: Report I-2024050065
item.description:
Report I-2024050065

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-19T18:15:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-06
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: OAK HARBOR FREIGHT LINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While in unload a 55 gal drum was struck by a forklift breaching it. Several ounces escaped the drum before "puddy" was used to seal the opening. The damaged drum was placed in the HW area and will be disposed of by a licensed HazWaster hauler.
